products.title: Mexican Hot Pizza
products.description: Crispy thin crust pizza with mozarella. Minced beef, Salami and Chicken with a tangy tomato base. Topped off with spicy Mayo.

products.title: Murgi Madness
products.description: Chicken cuttings, meat mixed with spices. Infused with mozarella cheese and spicy sauce

products.title: Sambal Chicken Rice Bowl
products.description: Chicken with mixed vegetable rice. Contains spicy tomato and mustard sauce.

products.title: Fish and Chips
products.description: Golden battered Dory fish, deep fried to crispy goodness. Served with chips and a garlicky tartar sauce.

products.title: Double Decker Burger - Beef
products.description: Beef burger with two beef patties. Includes mozarella cheese and teriyaki sauce. Briche buns makes it more crispy.

products.title: Korean Fried Chicken
products.description: Deep fried chicken that are coated with a sweet and spicy gochujang sauce.
